--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Derek James <djames@g...> wrote:

> 
> Along these lines, I like the idea of "speciated sampling", though I
> don't think you gave it a name.  You used this technique in the JAIR
> paper, correct?  Sampling evenly from species, rather than randomly
> from the population as a whole?
> 

Ahh yeah, I agree that really can help and makes sense.  It's also
easy to do with NEAT since it already speciates.  That's right, we do
use that in the JAIR paper.

ken
